original_title: De Club van Sinterklaas en het Vergeten Pietje
overview: Young Fernando will unintentionally bring St. Nicholas' eve in danger when he misses the boat with the golden key in his pocket. With his best friend Pony he trots as fast as he can overland to Holland, but will he still be on time?
title: De Club van Sinterklaas en het Vergeten Pietje
